tasks.label: Clean build + HTMLProofer (internal)
tasks.command: rm -rf _site && bundle exec jekyll build --quiet && SKIP_EXTERNAL=1 bundle exec htmlproofer ./_site --check-html --allow-missing-href

tasks.label: Jekyll clean prod build (tee log)
tasks.command:
set -e
mkdir -p Logs Logs/htmlproofer
rm -rf _site
bundle check || bundle install --path vendor/bundle
JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build --trace | tee Logs/build-latest.txt
